using namespace std;
 #define gc getchar_unlocked


void scanint(int &x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

#define N 1000001
vector<long long>dp;
unsigned long long int sum(int n)
{
    return  (unsigned long long int)n*(n+1)/2;
}
int main()
{
    int i,n,t;
    dp.resize(1000001);
    for(i=0;i<N;i++)
        dp[i]=0;
    dp[4]=1;
    for(i=5;i<N;i++)
    {
        n = i/2 -1;
        dp[i]=dp[i-1]+2*sum(n)-((!(i&1))*n);
    }
    scanint(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanint(n);
        printf("%lld\n",dp[n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
